title: Smartphone users in Canada 2013 to 2023
summary: In general Smartphone users in millions has rose over the Year.
Smartphone users in millions is slightly increasing from 2019 to 2020.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2019 and 2020.
The highest Smartphone users in millions, of value 27.7 was reached at Year 2020
The lowest Smartphone users in millions, of value 26.6 was reported at Year 2019
